title: The Information Thieves
description: The Information Thieves occurs in the same "universe" as Raft People, but about a generation later. Enjoy a high tech adventure in the near-future. Dallas comes complete with expert hackers, high tech global companies, crowded tent cities, genetically engineered super-boys, cloned Neanderthals, underworld samurais, and plenty of information thieves.
author: M.L. Katz
